name: S.I.N.G.L.E.
description:
Humanity is Doomed!

Don't worry we have a solution, a space ark that will save us all, unfortunately only couples get in and you're still single.

Your best friend, Trevor, got your back, he built the Super INterdimentional Galatic LovEr, aka the S.I.N.G.L.E Dating App. Swipe right on creatures from other dimensions to find your true love.
